channel.title: Andrew Sinclair on Transcripts of Iriss.fm
channel.description: Recent content in Andrew Sinclair on Transcripts of Iriss.fm

item.title: Ensemble music project
item.description: MD - Michelle Drumm MT - Michael Timmons AS - Andrew Sinclair Ensemble is a Loretto Care project that supports young people out of homelessness through songwriting and music. On the 19th of September Michelle from Iriss travelled to Stirling to speak with Michael Timmons, community engagement lead for the project, and Andrew Sinclair, a participant and volunteer. Ensemble received a different approach award at the Scottish Social Services Awards 2019.
